sentence: “Our nation’s laws are highly relevant to the ongoing situation in Ukraine,” 43 U.S. House members led by Reps. Peter DeFazio (D-Ore.) and Warren Davidson (R-Ohio) wrote in a letter to the White House on Tuesday.
author: Jake Johnson
title: Lawmakers Warn Biden He Can’t Unilaterally Send US Troops to Fight Russia

sentence: “Therefore, we ask that your decisions comport with the Constitution and our nation’s laws by consulting with Congress to receive authorization before any such development.” The letter was signed by Reps. Nancy Mace (R-S.C.), Pramila Jayapal (D-Wash.), Ilhan Omar (D-Minn.), Matt Gaetz (R-Fla.) and Warren Davidson (R-Ohio), among others.
author: The Hill via Nexstar Media Wire
title: Lawmakers urge Biden to ask Congress before sending military to Ukraine

sentence: Rep. Peter DeFazio, an Oregon Democrat, and Rep. Warren Davidson, an Ohio Republican, led the diverse group of 43 members of Congress in a letter to Biden, urging him to follow the Constitution when considering deploying U.S. troops.
author: Marisa Schultz
title: Lawmakers urge Biden to get congressional approval before stationing US troops in Ukraine
